channel.title: Fable-Pk [SPAWN/::MASTER/MINIGAMES/PVM/::ITEM/BOSSES]
channel.description:
Welcome to Fable-Pk. We are a brand new server. The purpose of the Fable-Pk is to let players experience a great time. With perfect pking and tons of features, that is our main goal. We want to provide the perfect place for pkers to come together and battle it out, but we also want to provide other main features such as minigames, PvM and other activities.
I hope you enjoy our server.
Forums: [url=http://www.fablepk.com/]http://www.fablepk.com/[/url]
Download our client(Updated 3/14/14): [url=http://www.fablepk.com/play/client.jar]http://www.fablepk.com/play/client.jar[/url]
Play on our Webclient(Updated 3/14/14): [url=http://www.fablepk.com/play/]http://www.fablepk.com/play/[/url]
LATEST UPDATES: 3/15/14: NEW BOSSES! NEW ITEMS NEW ANIMATIONS NEW CLIENT UPDATES(GAMEFRAME, INTERFACES, ETC.) WEBCLIENT NOW WORKS!
FEATURES: BOSSING(FROST DRAGONS,TORMENTED DEMONS, CORP, KALPHITE QUEEN AND MANY MORE!)
SPAWNING( ::ITEM ID # ) ::MASTER Basic Economy PERFECT SWITCHES PERFECT FOOD TIMERS PERFECT DRAGON CLAWS TORVA, KORASI AND MORE! Newer data added! NEAR PERFECT Curses added! GREAT FORUMLAS SIMILAR TO RUNESCAPE MINIGAMES - Duel Arena and more to come PVM AutoCache Downloading client! [url=http://www.fablepk.com/play/client.jar]http://www.fablepk.com/play/client.jar[/url] Auto-Vote Auto-Donate HighScores - coming soon Spawning buttons(Master set, Zerk set, Pure set, Hybrid set, food, potions, runes and more) Fully functional Clan Chat
[SPOILER=NEW MEDIA] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2v34kkg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2w5mu4k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/wgoj7p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/k9uadz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/300tuoh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2hf8fn9.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=MEDIA] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/33bjqev.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/noezow.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/oqksno.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2edpp9v.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/edmxl.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
CREDITS: @ProjectPk @Raw Envy @Sanity
Thank you haters... keep me motivated ;)

@Fable-Pk wrote:

Welcome to Fable-Pk. We are a brand new server. The purpose of the Fable-Pk is to let players experience a great time. With perfect pking and tons of features, that is our main goal. We want to provide the perfect place for pkers to come together and battle it out, but we also want to provide other main features such as minigames, PvM and other activities.

I hope you enjoy our server.
